name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: This records identifiers associated with this procedure that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

name: $addidentifier
desc: This records identifiers associated with this procedure that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: This records identifiers associated with this procedure that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

name: $definition
desc: Returns: A protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that was adhered to in whole or in part by this procedure.

name: $adddefinition
desc: A protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that was adhered to in whole or in part by this procedure.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that was adhered to in whole or in part by this procedure.

name: $basedOn
desc: Returns: A reference to a resource that contains details of the request for this procedure.

name: $addbasedOn
desc: A reference to a resource that contains details of the request for this procedure.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A reference to a resource that contains details of the request for this procedure.

name: $partOf
desc: Returns: A larger event of which this particular procedure is a component or step.

name: $addpartOf
desc: A larger event of which this particular procedure is a component or step.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A larger event of which this particular procedure is a component or step.

name: $status
desc: Returns: A code specifying the state of the procedure. Generally this will be in-progress or completed state.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code specifying the state of the procedure. Generally this will be in-progress or completed state.

name: $notDone
desc: Returns: Set this to true if the record is saying that the procedure was NOT performed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Set this to true if the record is saying that the procedure was NOT performed.

name: $notDoneReason
desc: Returns: A code indicating why the procedure was not performed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code indicating why the procedure was not performed.

name: $category
desc: Returns: A code that classifies the procedure for searching, sorting and display purposes (e.g. "Surgical Procedure").

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code that classifies the procedure for searching, sorting and display purposes (e.g. "Surgical Procedure").

name: $code
desc: Returns: The specific procedure that is performed. Use text if the exact nature of the procedure cannot be coded (e.g. "Laparoscopic Appendectomy").

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The specific procedure that is performed. Use text if the exact nature of the procedure cannot be coded (e.g. "Laparoscopic Appendectomy").

name: $subject
desc: Returns: The person, animal or group on which the procedure was performed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The person, animal or group on which the procedure was performed.

name: $context
desc: Returns: The encounter during which the procedure was performed.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The encounter during which the procedure was performed.

name: $performer
desc: Returns: Limited to 'real' people rather than equipment.

name: $addperformer
desc: Limited to 'real' people rather than equipment.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Limited to 'real' people rather than equipment.

name: $location
desc: Returns: The location where the procedure actually happened.  E.g. a newborn at home, a tracheostomy at a restaurant.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The location where the procedure actually happened.  E.g. a newborn at home, a tracheostomy at a restaurant.

name: $reasonCode
desc: Returns: The coded reason why the procedure was performed. This may be coded entity of some type, or may simply be present as text.

name: $addreasonCode
desc: The coded reason why the procedure was performed. This may be coded entity of some type, or may simply be present as text.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The coded reason why the procedure was performed. This may be coded entity of some type, or may simply be present as text.

name: $reasonReference
desc: Returns: The condition that is the reason why the procedure was performed.

name: $addreasonReference
desc: The condition that is the reason why the procedure was performed.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The condition that is the reason why the procedure was performed.

name: $bodySite
desc: Returns: Detailed and structured anatomical location information. Multiple locations are allowed - e.g. multiple punch biopsies of a lesion.

name: $addbodySite
desc: Detailed and structured anatomical location information. Multiple locations are allowed - e.g. multiple punch biopsies of a lesion.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Detailed and structured anatomical location information. Multiple locations are allowed - e.g. multiple punch biopsies of a lesion.

name: $outcome
desc: Returns: The outcome of the procedure - did it resolve reasons for the procedure being performed?

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The outcome of the procedure - did it resolve reasons for the procedure being performed?

name: $report
desc: Returns: This could be a histology result, pathology report, surgical report, etc..

name: $addreport
desc: This could be a histology result, pathology report, surgical report, etc..

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: This could be a histology result, pathology report, surgical report, etc..

name: $complication
desc: Returns: Any complications that occurred during the procedure, or in the immediate post-performance period. These are generally tracked separately from the notes, which will typically describe the procedure itself rather than any 'post procedure' issues.

name: $addcomplication
desc: Any complications that occurred during the procedure, or in the immediate post-performance period. These are generally tracked separately from the notes, which will typically describe the procedure itself rather than any 'post procedure' issues.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Any complications that occurred during the procedure, or in the immediate post-performance period. These are generally tracked separately from the notes, which will typically describe the procedure itself rather than any 'post procedure' issues.

name: $complicationDetail
desc: Returns: Any complications that occurred during the procedure, or in the immediate post-performance period.

name: $addcomplicationDetail
desc: Any complications that occurred during the procedure, or in the immediate post-performance period.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Any complications that occurred during the procedure, or in the immediate post-performance period.

name: $followUp
desc: Returns: If the procedure required specific follow up - e.g. removal of sutures. The followup may be represented as a simple note, or could potentially be more complex in which case the CarePlan resource can be used.

name: $addfollowUp
desc: If the procedure required specific follow up - e.g. removal of sutures. The followup may be represented as a simple note, or could potentially be more complex in which case the CarePlan resource can be used.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: If the procedure required specific follow up - e.g. removal of sutures. The followup may be represented as a simple note, or could potentially be more complex in which case the CarePlan resource can be used.

name: $note
desc: Returns: Any other notes about the procedure.  E.g. the operative notes.

name: $addnote
desc: Any other notes about the procedure.  E.g. the operative notes.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Any other notes about the procedure.  E.g. the operative notes.

name: $focalDevice
desc: Returns: A device that is implanted, removed or otherwise manipulated (calibration, battery replacement, fitting a prosthesis, attaching a wound-vac, etc.) as a focal portion of the Procedure.

name: $addfocalDevice
desc: A device that is implanted, removed or otherwise manipulated (calibration, battery replacement, fitting a prosthesis, attaching a wound-vac, etc.) as a focal portion of the Procedure.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A device that is implanted, removed or otherwise manipulated (calibration, battery replacement, fitting a prosthesis, attaching a wound-vac, etc.) as a focal portion of the Procedure.

name: $usedReference
desc: Returns: Identifies medications, devices and any other substance used as part of the procedure.

name: $addusedReference
desc: Identifies medications, devices and any other substance used as part of the procedure.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies medications, devices and any other substance used as part of the procedure.

name: $usedCode
desc: Returns: Identifies coded items that were used as part of the procedure.

name: $addusedCode
desc: Identifies coded items that were used as part of the procedure.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies coded items that were used as part of the procedure.
